languages.text: "Я заплатила за все сполна. Потеряла себя и больше... не могу медитировать. Ни моя душа, ни мое тело отныне не знают покоя".
"I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."
languages.original_text: "Я заплатила за все сполна. Потеряла себя и больше... не могу медитировать. Ни моя душа, ни мое тело отныне не знают покоя".

traits.locale_text: "I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."
"I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."
"I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."
"I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."
"I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."

languages.text: “我付出了惨重的代价。我失去了自我，甚至还有……我心中的宁静。此时此刻，我的灵魂与身体根本无法获得安宁。”
languages.original_text: "I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."

traits.locale_text: “我付出了惨重的代价。我失去了自我，甚至还有……我心中的宁静。此时此刻，我的灵魂与身体根本无法获得安宁。”

languages.text: 「我は十分に報いを受けた。自身を見失い、そして…瞑想さえも。我の精神も身体も、休むことを知らない」
languages.original_text: "I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."

traits.locale_text: 「我は十分に報いを受けた。自身を見失い、そして…瞑想さえも。我の精神も身体も、休むことを知らない」

languages.text: « J'en ai payé tout le prix. Je me suis perdue et j'ai même perdu... ma méditation. Ni mon âme ni mon corps ne connaîtront plus le repos à présent. »
languages.original_text: "I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai payé tout le prix. Je me suis perdue et j'ai même perdu... ma méditation. Ni mon âme ni mon corps ne connaîtront plus le repos à présent. »

languages.text: «Pagué el precio en su totalidad. Acabé perdiéndome a mí misma y hasta la capacidad de meditar... Ahora soy incapaz de que mi alma o cuerpo descansen».
languages.original_text: "I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."

traits.locale_text: «Pagué el precio en su totalidad. Acabé perdiéndome a mí misma y hasta la capacidad de meditar... Ahora soy incapaz de que mi alma o cuerpo descansen».

languages.text: "Ich habe den vollen Preis bezahlt. Ich habe mich selbst verloren und sogar ... meine Meditation. Jetzt können weder meine Seele noch mein Körper ruhen."
languages.original_text: "I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe den vollen Preis bezahlt. Ich habe mich selbst verloren und sogar ... meine Meditation. Jetzt können weder meine Seele noch mein Körper ruhen."

languages.text: "Bedelimi ödedim ben. Kendimi ve meditasyonumu kaybettim. Şimdi olacakları ne ruhum ne de bedenim biliyor."
languages.original_text: "I paid the price in full. I have lost myself and even... my meditation. Neither my soul nor my body may know rest now."

traits.locale_text: "Bedelimi ödedim ben. Kendimi ve meditasyonumu kaybettim. Şimdi olacakları ne ruhum ne de bedenim bilmiyor."
